comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model CheckpointAreaLocation adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/CheckpointAreaLocation/schema.json
description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint.

contents.name: Latitude
contents.comment: Coordinate of the latitude of the checkpoint area location.

contents.name: Longitude
contents.comment: Coordinate of the longitude of the checkpoint area location.

contents.name: Name
contents.comment: Unique name for geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint Area Location.

contents.name: Srid
contents.comment: A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions

contents.name: AirportElevation
contents.comment: The height of an Airport, above sea level.

contents.name: ZoneAreaLocation
contents.comment: The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Queuing Zone in a Terminal.
